App.ConfirmEmail: Redirect url to confirm email with token
App.ResetPassword: Redirect url to reset password with token

Jwt.AccessTokenExpirationMinutes: Time to expire access token in minutes
Jwt.RefreshTokenExpirationDays: Time to expire refresh token in days

Email.User: Your auth username to email sender services
Email.Password: Your auth password to email sender services

Delegating.UrlToReplace: Your Url to Replace by delegating
